title: How to Make Marshmallow Cupcakes

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to Gas Mark 3.
Put the flour, sugar, baking powder, and butter into a large bowl and mix well while gradually adding half the milk, mix until all ingredients are combined and you get a smooth consistency.
Whisk together in a separate bowl; Vanilla extract, egg and remaining milk before adding to the original mix and combining all ingredients.
Evenly pour the mixture into 12 paper cases about 2/3 full, bake in a preheated oven for roughly 20-25 minutes until light golden.
steps.description: A knife inserted in the center should come out clean.

steps.headline: Put the medium marshmallows into a heatproof bowl over a pan of simmering water, leave until melted and smooth.
steps.description: When the cupcakes are cool, hollow out a small section in the center of each cupcake and fill with a dollop of melted marshmallow, leave to cool.

steps.headline: Beat icing sugar and butter together in a large bowl.
Combine the milk and vanilla extract in a separate bowl and gradually add to the mixture
Continue mixing until mixture becomes light and fluffy.
Spoon the frosting on top of the cupcakes.

text: Making the Cupcakes Preheat the oven to Gas Mark 3.  Put the flour, sugar, baking powder, and butter into a large bowl and mix well while gradually adding half the milk, mix until all ingredients are combined and you get a smooth consistency.  Whisk together in a separate bowl; Vanilla extract, egg and remaining milk before adding to the original mix and combining all ingredients.  Evenly pour the mixture into 12 paper cases about 2/3 full, bake in a preheated oven for roughly 20-25 minutes until light golden. A knife inserted in the center should come out clean. Put the medium marshmallows into a heatproof bowl over a pan of simmering water, leave until melted and smooth. When the cupcakes are cool, hollow out a small section in the center of each cupcake and fill with a dollop of melted marshmallow, leave to cool. Making the Frosting Beat icing sugar and butter together in a large bowl.  Combine the milk and vanilla extract in a separate bowl and gradually add to the mixture  Continue mixing until mixture becomes light and fluffy.  Stir in mini-marshmallows.  Spoon the frosting on top of the cupcakes.  Finished
